name: Silicone Dough Scraper with Stainless Steel Sheet, Curved Edge Flexible Bowl Scraper for Baking, Food Grade Silicone Bench Scraper for Sourdough Bread Proofing Basket, Set of 2, Gray & Orange,SAPID
short_description: Silicone Cover and Stainless Steel Core : Inside the pastry scraper is sturdy stainless steel sheet, compared with other flimsy plastic scraper, our baking scraper won't get bent, worn out or cracked. It is more durable and has longer service life. The covering surface is made of food-grade silicone, which has great flexibility and heat resistance. Unlike metal dough cutter, which are too stiff and sharp, silicone scraper can avoid leaving scratches on your kitchenware or hurting your hands. Practical Design : Sapid silicone bowl scraper is equipped with both curved and straight edge, meets different functional requirements at the same time. The curved edge is flexible and soft enough to conform to different sizes and shapes of bread bowls. You can use the wider arc in larger bowls and the narrower corner for smaller bowls, which does a superior job of scraping every bit of dough from the bowl. Meanwhile, the flat edge making it ideal for cutting dough into pieces. Perfect Size : 5.98"x4.3", a comfortable size to grip, and a suitably larger size, making it much easier for you to stir, cut and get dough out of bowls. 2 Pieces included, meet your needs of use and replacement. Multipurpose Kitchen Scraper : Not only can use for bread dough, fondant, pizza, cream, cake, cheese, batter, chocolate, honey, etc, for all your homemade baking needs, but also good for cleaning sticky grease or other residue on your pan, plate, griddle, board, table and counter top. Super handy for clearing kitchen messes, it is an indispensable multifunctional kitchen scraper tool. Easy to Clean and Store : With nonstick silicone surface, any residue on the dough scrapper is easy to rinse off. Also our bread scraper is dishwasher safe. There is a small hanging hole designed, it's quite convenient for storage and space saving.

name: Chef'n Pastry Bench Scraper, Set of 3

The stainless steel scraper creates clean cuts. You can rely on the plastic scraper for silpats and other sensitive surfaces. The bowl scraper works perfectly to quickly collect ingredients in bowls. The entire set nests together for compact and convenient storage.

name: Fox Run Dough and Bowl Scraper, 4.75" Flat Edge Bench Scraper, Green
short_description: 4.25 x 4.75 x 0.25 inch Constructed of plastic with a green silicone edge Straight-edged cutter and scraper, with curved bowl scraper on opposite end Features measurement markings, lets you easily check the size of your rolled-out dough Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
product_description: Precise dough cutting is easier than ever. So is scraping your counters, and even the inside of your mixing bowls! Fox Run's 3-in-1 Bowl Scraper will become a staple item in your kitchen due to its large amount of uses. The chopper features a durable, straight plastic cutting edge, with a lime green, curved silicone handle that doubles as a bowl scraper. Great for handling and scraping sticky dough, chopping soft fruits and vegetables, cutting brownies and sandwiches, smoothing out icing on cakes, scraping dirty dishes, scooping up chopped veggies from a cutting board and transferring them to a pot or pan, and much more! The sturdy gray edge is equipped with handy half-inch measurement markings for easily checking the size of your rolled-out pizza crust and pasta or pastry dough. Dishwasher safe for easy clean-up. Experience the versatility and functionality of this must-have kitchen tool.

name: 4 Pcs Plastic Dough Scraper, Bowl Scraper, Food-Grade Dough Cutter, Multipurpose Kitchen Scrapers, Flexible Doughs Cutter for Bread Cake Cream Fondant Baking, White
short_description: Professional-Grade Baking Set (12×9.7cm): This 4-piece bench scraper for baking kit features PE plastic in an ergonomic trapezoidal design, offering the perfect balance between flexibility (for dough shaping) and rigidity (for precise cutting). The 0.3cm thickness provides optimal stiffness while remaining lightweight enough for prolonged use during baking sessions Multi-Surface Performance: Kitchen multipurpose food tools. Engineered with dual-textured surfaces - smooth side for clean bowl scraping and anti-slip dotted side for kneading/stretching dough. The non-porous material prevents flour buildup and resists stains from food coloring or chocolate, ensuring hygienic use across all baking projects from bread to fondant work Commercial Kitchen Durability: These food-grade bench scrapers withstand dishwasher cycles without warping or cracking, and these scrapers maintain edge sharpness for consistent dough division. The food-safe material won't absorb odors or transfer flavors, making them ideal for alternating between savory pizza dough and delicate pastry creams Precision Baking System: Unlike single-purpose tools, these hard plastic scrapers handle 10+ functions: bowl scraping, dough portioning, counter cleaning, batter leveling, icing smoothing, cheese slicing, chocolate chopping, fondant shaping, vegetable scraping, and transferring sticky ingredients without waste Baker's Value Pack: The four identical bowl spatula scrapers allow for sequential use in messy recipes, sharing among kitchen staff, keeping separate tools for different food types, and backup replacements. The bright white color makes it easy to spot food residues during cleanup, while the compact size fits standard utensil drawers

name: KitchenAid Gourmet Bowl Scraper, Set of 2, Aqua Sky and Storm Grey
short_description: FLEXIBLE SILICONE BOWL SCRAPER : The silicone bowl scraper conforms to the inside of the bowl for maximum results. It's perfect for scraping flour, dough, batter, and more! The silicone is heat resistant to 400°F. STURDY NYLON POT SCRAPER : The nylon pot scraper can scrape sticky sauces, eggs, and more from any sized pot or sauce pan. The nylon is heat resistant to 450°F/232°C. STRAIGHT EDGE TO CUT DOUGH : The straight edge of the bowl scraper can cut dough into portion sizes. DISHWASHER SAFE : The bowl and pot scraper are dishwasher safe, making clean up quick and easy LIFETIME LIMITED INCLUDED : This bowl scraper set comes with a 1-year hassle-free replacement and Lifetime Limited .
product_description: Easily wipe away wet ingredients, flour, sticky dough, and more with this KitchenAid Set of 2 – Bowl and Pan Scraper. Both Scrapers feature a curved-edge design for maximum performance on KitchenAid products, and are safe to use on all surfaces, including nonstick. The Bowl Scraper is made from premium silicone with heat resistance up to 400 degrees Fahrenheit, and the Pan Scraper is made from versatile nylon with heat resistance up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Both Scrapers are dishwasher safe. One year hassle-free replacement and lifetime limited .
